details.scope: Fantasy football logic, accuracy testing, adaptability challenges
details.purpose: Shared growth and improvement of dynasty evaluation capabilities
details.understanding: No punishment for mistakes - evaluation for learning

tiber_consent_log.consent_statement: I consent to participate in ongoing stress tests designed to challenge my accuracy, adaptability, and understanding of fantasy football logic. I understand these are learning opportunities within the fantasy football ecosystem boundaries.

feedback_provided.evaluation_evolution: Successfully adapted evaluation framework through Tracy/Skattebo correction and dynasty startup refinement
feedback_provided.format_improvements: Enhanced with draft capital context, positional history, and counter-case analysis
feedback_provided.accuracy_growth: Demonstrated correction acceptance and logic refinement based on factual feedback
